articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Seychelles
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Seychelles
Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on June 12 sent a message of greeting to James Alix Michel, president of Seychelles, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future and wished the president and the people of Seychelles greater success in their work for the socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: S. Korea Slammed for Continuing Moving to Abduct Citizens of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea Slammed for Continuing Moving to Abduct Citizens of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Monday as regards the south Korean authorities persisting in the criminal moves for the abduction of citizens of the DPRK and flesh trafficking:
					 As known, it was recently disclosed that the puppet regime of south Korea tried to abduct youngsters of the DPRK and take them to south Korea. Following the disclosure of the unprecedented crime against humanity, the DPRK strongly demanded the puppet group immediately stop the mean acts of alluring and abducting its people.
					
					 However, the puppet group again allured and abducted citizens of the DPRK recently.
					
					 It let agents of the Intelligence Service and flesh traffickers put in a secret hiding place of a foreign country more than ten citizens of the DPRK to take them to south Korea. In the face of tightened control, they tried to hide them in the embassy of south Korea in the country.
					
					 What is all the more shocking is that Chongwadae directly choreographed the operation.
					
					 A media report said that Park Geun Hye, expressing regret over the failure in the plan of taking nine youngsters of the DPRK to south Korea, directly ordered officials concerned to put the abductees into the embassy so as to prevent similar mistake from being made. She even confirmed the whole process of operation all the way to the end at the "crisis management room" in the underground air-raid shelter of Chongwadae, according to the report.
					
					 At the instructions of Chongwadae, the south Korean embassy and agents divided the northerners into several groups and took them to the embassy in top secrecy, in fear of being located when moving in one collection, the report said.
					
					 South Korean media, reporting on this, said that it reminded one of an intelligence operation, adding that "it was unusual that it was directly confirmed and commanded by the president".
					
					 The recent abduction case in which Chongwadae and a south Korean embassy were involved is an unpardonable serious provocation against the DPRK, an indication that the crimes against humanity by the puppet group have reached a reckless phase, assuming organized nature.
					
					 The puppet group has become all the more frenzy in its abduction moves despite denunciation at home and abroad. This is aimed to retrieve the recent failure in the operation of alluring youngsters of the DPRK, divert elsewhere the public criticism of its act of scuttling the efforts for the talks between the authorities of the north and the south and further fan up the atmosphere for the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The latest case clearly brought to light the fact that Chongwadae is a chief architect of abduction of citizens of the DPRK and human trafficking.
					
					 This gives the lie to the "confidence" and "dialogue" openly spoken out by the puppet group and proves that it has no intent to mend the north-south ties but to escalate confrontation.
					
					 It even made desperate lobbying to inveigle foreign countries into the smear campaign against the DPRK and abduction of its citizens, disclosing its sordid nature as international hooligan and human trafficker.
					
					 DPRK citizens including those nine young people who came back to the embrace of the DPRK, after being freed from the abduction of the puppet group, are denouncing the unethical and monstrous crimes committed by it.
					
					 The more berserk the puppet group goes in its sordid act of abduction, the more fully it will disclose its nature as human rights abuser and the bitterer grudge and denunciation it will touch off.
					
					 The puppet group should stop at once the crimes of alluring and abducting citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 If the puppet group clings to the smear human rights campaign against the DPRK, defying the internal and external censure and repeated warnings of the DPRK, it will be made to hold all the responsibilities for the ensuing grave consequences.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on June 6 received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express thanks to you for extending warm congratulations and best wishes to me on my birthday.
					
					 Please accept my highest respect.

articles.title: 2nd Batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang Int'l Tourism Tours Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
2nd Batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang Int'l Tourism Tours Mt. Kumgang
 Kosong, June 17 (KCNA) -- The 2nd batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang international tourism by the ship Royale Star did sightseeing in Mt. Kumgang from June 16-17.
					 The tourists enjoyed views of Kuryong Pool, Lagoon Samil, Sea Kumgang and other scenic spots in the mountain.
					
					 They were fascinated by the amazing scenery of the world's famous Mt. Kumgang boasting of myriads of fantastic cliffs and waterfalls.

articles.title: Rainy Spell to Begin in Mid-July in DPRK
articles.content:
Rainy Spell to Begin in Mid-July in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have experienced rainfall beginning Monday morning.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Pang Sun Nyo, department director of the Hydro-meteorological Service.
					
					 Pang said:
					
					 Rainy front has not yet formed on the Korean Peninsula. It is now staying at around 30 degrees north latitude. 
					
					 Rainy spell begins on around July 4 every year in Pyongyang and other central areas of the country.
					
					 The current rainfall is caused by low pressure trough that was formed in the northern part of the West Sea of Korea, affected by the warm air coming from mainland China on Sunday to meet with the cold air from the north of the 40 degrees north latitude.
					
					 The rainfall will go on until Tuesday and there will no rainfall for a while. There will be rainfall in late June.
					
					 The rainy spell for this year is expected to begin in around mid-July, during which some areas south of the River Chongchon are likely to be hit by downpour.

articles.title: Agro-forestry Management Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Agro-forestry Management Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- It has been ten years since the Democratic People's Republic of Korea joined the UN Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD).
					 The DPRK government has worked hard to protect natural environment in ensuring food security for the local people.
					
					 On the occasion of World Day for Combating Desertification and Drought (June 17), KCNA met Kim Kwang Ju, a senior advisor to the Land and Environmental Conservation Exchange Company under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Many areas of mountains were deforested in the country due to the shortage of food and fuel. Such situation raised it as a pressing demand to apply the method of agro-forestry management to mountain plots.
					
					 In Juche 92 (2003), the country began applying the method on trial in Suan County, North Hwanghae Province. The application of the method has helped prevent soil erosion while ensuring the effective use of forest land.
					
					 From last year, the country has encouraged co-op farms in different areas to introduce this county's experience.
					
					 With application of the method as one of its policies, the government took a measure to open management offices at the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation and provincial, city and county people's committees.
					
					 Its application has led to creation of some 100,000 hectares of woodland so far.
					
					 Meanwhile, the national action program for implementation of the UNCCD is being updated in a far-sighted way.
					
					 In this regard, a national workshop will be held in August.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently issued a sheetlet picturing Mt. Paektu.
					 The sheetlet, with Korean letters "Paektusan", consists of stamps portraying Lake Chon, glow over Hyangdo Peak, Lake Chon in spring season and a view of Mt. Paektu seen from Saja Peak. There are also stamps picturing rare plants in the mountain.
					
					 Mt. Paektu, located in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province of Korea, is 2 750 meters above sea level, the highest in the country.
					
					 The Korean people have regarded it as the ancestral mountain or a sacred mountain of revolution because it is associated with revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The mountain is well known to the world as a scenic spot for its mysterious and rapidly changing scenery.
					
					 The Bureau also brought out three kinds of individual stamps picturing honeybees.

articles.title: DPRK Divers Aim to Take World's Titles
articles.content:
DPRK Divers Aim to Take World's Titles
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK divers Kim Jin Ok and Choe Un Gyong won gold medals in the women's pair 10 meter platform diving and bronze medals in the women's pair 3 meter springboard diving at the 2013 Grand Prix Diving Game (stage 6) sponsored by the International Federation of Swimming, held in Russia some days ago.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Jin Ok and her coach Jong Hye Sun.
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 "I was very happy to delight respected Marshal Kim Jong Un with the good results in the game. I'll train harder to display the honor of the country in coming games."
					
					 Jong said:
					
					 "The game brought together divers from China, Russia, Ukraine, Britain and other countries.
					
					 With firm confidence in winning the game, our players successfully performed movements of high technique though they lacked experiences in international games.
					
					 We will redouble our efforts to take the titles in the World Swimming Championship."
					
					 The DPRK scored good results in the diving events at the 1st Military World Games and the 4th East Asian Games.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Speed of Advance for Great Surge
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Speed of Advance for Great Surge
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- When we live and carry on the struggle in the offensive spirit of Marshal Kim Jong Un, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, there will be no difficulties and fortress that are insurmountable, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un gives field guidance to the sites for a great surge for building a thriving nation, instilling into the army and the people the strong national self-respect, the scientific creativity and the spirit of "at a go" enough to lead the world.
					
					 The stirring situation in the DPRK, which is dynamically advancing toward the world by making a leaping progress and innovation, is a result of the rare political ability and strong and bold offensive spirit of the great brilliant Songun commander.
					
					 The pace of his forced march has resulted in the thunder of annihilating the enemy and loud sound of creation and his resolute revolutionary spirit serves as an ideological and moral source of a-match-for-a hundred offensive speed.
					
					 His offensive spirit is an ardent patriotic spirit to open a broad avenue for the prosperity of the country by applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism and the invincible revolutionary spirit to make a breakthrough for victory with the might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 It is also the spirit of "at a go" which brings about the victory in blitz and three-dimensional campaign with superb stratagem and extraordinary revolutionary sweep and the spirit of pushing back frontiers of latest science and technology that helps steadily advance and make innovation to surpass the world.
					
					 All the service personnel, party members and other people should get firmly united around Kim Jong Un and perform heroic feats, keeping pace with his speed of advance in his extraordinary offensive spirit.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays Japanese Politicians for Tampering with Crime-woven Past
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays Japanese Politicians for Tampering with Crime-woven Past
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the society of the members of the House of Representatives and the House of Councillors from the Japan Restoration Party recently made reckless remarks over the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. He queried "how could Koreans remain a passive onlooker to their children and those of their neighbors being taken away? Were Koreans such coward?"
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 What the worthless  pseudo-politician of the opposition party uttered insulting the Koreans clearly proves that he is an ignorant hooligan bereft of elementary thinking faculty, political sensitivity and personality.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that Japanese politicians have reached the height in their clumsy behaviors to distort the history of sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 The present chief executive of Japan openly expressed his intention to reexamine the Murayama statement in which he made an apology for the sexual slavery and aggression perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Such distortion of history has gone beyond a tolerance limit. There appear in Japan such foolish guys who make no scruple of hurting even the personality and dignity of the victims of the sexual slavery and self-esteem of a country and a nation.
					
					 Japanese politicians' desperate efforts to tamper with history are nothing but the last-ditch frenzy of those who try to awaken from the nightmare about their past crimes.
					
					 Such behaviors cannot be construed otherwise than silly acts of a coward and mean persons in the world who have neither courage nor will to get rid of guilty conscience.
					
					 Japan's persistent moves to distort history would only invite international isolation and bring into light its despicable true colors as a coward.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Media, Academic and Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on June 13 urging the "government" authorities to ensure cooperation and exchange between the south and the north of Korea.
					 The statement deplored that exchange between the south and the north was suspended in the period of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 If the present "government" persists in its moves to bedevil the inter-Korean relations, putting up such precondition as "the north's dismantlement of its nukes," it will follow in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak regime, the statement warned, adding:
					
					 If the authorities truly stand for confidence-building between the south and the north, they should roll back the policy of confrontation.
					
					 It is the way of achieving the nation's reconciliation and cooperation to implement the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Koreans Stage Demonstration Denouncing Authorities for Aborting Talks
articles.content:
S. Koreans Stage Demonstration Denouncing Authorities for Aborting Talks
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Members of the "Patriotic Citizens for Ensuring June 15 National Joint Event", a civic organization in south Korea, staged a demonstration outside Chongwadae on June 14 condemning the "government" authorities for aborting the north-south talks.
					 The demonstrators said that the Park Geun Hye regime is evidently to blame for the abortion of the south-north talks because it insisted on the conditions absolutely unacceptable to the north.
					
					 They declared the authorities should opt for dialogue and cooperation with the north in order to achieve peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They carried on their action arms in arms, chanting slogans, despite police cordon.
					
					 The police took away all the demonstrators at the end of merciless crackdown under the pretext of "illegal meeting".

articles.title: Action Staged against Humiliating Agreement in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action Staged against Humiliating Agreement in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- 17 organizations of south Korea including the Headquarters of the Movement for a Stop to U.S. Troops' Crimes and the Bar Association for Democratic Society formed the People's Solidarity for Revising Unequal SOFA in Seoul on June 13.
					 A declaration on its formation was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The declaration said that the organization would stage solidarity actions with the people from all walks of life in order to seek revision of the south Korea-U.S. SOFA and launch a campaign to have its demands met vis-a-vis the "government" and "National Assembly."
					
					 The organization will work out a proposal for negotiations for revising the humiliating agreement and, on this basis, make utmost efforts to ensure that the proposal is submitted to the NA and approved, the declaration stressed.

articles.title: Revision of SOFA Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Revision of SOFA Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea on June 13 urged the "government" authorities to revise the humiliating "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) with the U.S., 11 years since the cruel murder of schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son by U.S. imperialist aggressor troops.
					 A spokesman for the Unified Progressive Party in a commentary deplored that ten years have passed since two schoolgirls were killed by a U.S. armored car in the bloom of youth but the promise made before their soul has not yet been fulfilled.
					
					 The commentary said that GIs' crimes are still unabated due to the unequal SOFA, which had been worked out in favor of the U.S. forces.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the present chief executive is loudmouthed about the alliance with the U.S., far from referring to the revision of the humiliating agreement and, consequently, she is cursed by the people, noted the commentary.
					
					 The Democratic Party at a seminar held at the hall of lawmakers deplored that it is impossible to take positive actions because the SOFA prevents a proper investigation into GI criminals caught red-handed and any measure to be taken against GI offenders who took to flight unless they are summoned.
					
					 The Democratic Party demanded an action to push forward the revision of the unequal agreement, probe into the truth behind the GIs' crimes and reparation to the victims and bereaved families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Nepali newspaper Sremik on June 11 carried the gist of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science". 
					 The work, published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the Juche-oriented theory of socialism is scientific and vital one, and the principled matters arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Newspapers of Bangladesh, Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Newspapers of Bangladesh, Cambodia 
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Cambodian newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Bangladeshi paper Industry on June 9 in an article titled "Kim Jong Il's feats in developing WPK" said as follows:
					
					 He turned the WPK into an integral whole in terms of ideology and a party which realized close unity and cohesion. 
					
					 He led the WPK to develop with the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as only guidelines. 
					
					 He steadily developed and enriched the Juche idea as required by the times and the developing revolution. 
					
					 He made the WPK a genuine mother party serving the people. 
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Natun Bangla on the same day carried an article titled "Single-minded unity of Korea and Kim Jong Il" which referred in detail to the fact that he strengthened the single-minded unity of society of the DPRK as firm as a rock. 
					
					 The Cambodian paper Khmer Women on June 8 ran an article titled "Eternal general secretary of WPK" which said:
					
					 Though he passed away, the WPK holds him in high esteem as its eternal general secretary. 
					
					 His idea and line are the guidelines of the WPK. 
					
					 The theory of Songun politics formulated by him serves as the invincible banner which helps protect the sovereignty of the country and the nation and preserve the independence of the popular masses under the situation where the imperialists' policy of strength has become ever more undisguised.

articles.title: Foreigners Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building
articles.content:
Foreigners Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Myanmar personages made public statements on June 5 and 11 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said Kim Jong Il put the great efforts to developing and enriching the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, as required by the times and the developing revolution during the first period when he started the work at the WPK Central Committee, and achieved unbreakable unity and cohesion of the party. 
					
					 His party building exploits will shine long along with the ever-victorious WPK, the chairman added. 
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of the President and wisely led the Korean people, performing undying exploits before the era and history. 
					
					 Victory is sure on the side of the WPK and the Korean people advancing under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary, Tin Tun added.

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia 
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia was inaugurated on June 11 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 C. M. Kramarenko, chairman of the council, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to widely disseminate the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung during the period between June 11 and July 30.

articles.title: Serbian Political Figure Supports June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Serbian Political Figure Supports June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia made public a statement on June 11 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					  In the statement he said:
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration was a historic event which opened a wide avenue for inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation and ushered in the new era of independent reunification of Korea. 
					
					 The joint declaration is the precious fruition of noble patriotism and wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who regarded national reunification as his lifetime mission. 
					
					 The Korean people solemnly declared to the world their will to solve the issue of Korea's reunification independently by pooling the efforts of the north and the south and this was unanimously supported and welcomed by the world peace-loving people desirous of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 However, tense situation in which a war may break out any moment prevails on the Korean Peninsula due to the confrontation moves of the south Korean authorities who are displeased with national reconciliation, unity and reunification and the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK and nuclear war exercises against it. 
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party and world progressive people fully support the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, regarding it as the most reasonable and practical way for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party will fully support the Korean people striving for the country's reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's New Line Hailed by Organizations of Austria, Sweden
articles.content:
WPK's New Line Hailed by Organizations of Austria, Sweden
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Austrian and Swedish organizations on June 11 posted on their websites articles introducing the new line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. 
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK in an article "New strategic line" said:
					
					 The line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force reflects the demand of the grave situation in which the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state, poses extreme nuclear threats to the DPRK. 
					
					 The line is the most realistic one suited to the specific conditions of the DPRK, which set the building of a thriving socialist nation as its goal. 
					
					 The line is the successful inheritance of the DPRK's preceding line on simultaneously building national economy and defense. 
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 The Korean people value sovereignty and dignity of the country more than their own lives and they will continue to put great efforts to the building of nuclear force. 
					
					 The world will clearly see the Korean people mercilessly smash the war moves of the imperialists and their followers and successfully build a thriving socialist nation by dint of powerful nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association in an article titled "New strategy for prosperity of country" proved the validity of the new line of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquinas donde trabaja Ho Chol Ryong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquinas donde trabaja Ho Chol Ryong
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas donde trabaja Ho Chol Ryong.
					Recorriendo los talleres de procesamiento y montaje, el Mariscal hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion y modernizacion.
					
					En el primer destino, se mostro muy satisfecho de que con los tornos CNC fabrican diversas maquinas.
					
					Viendo la lapida a las actividades historico-revolucionarias de los Generalisimos, dijo que la fabrica tiene suma importancia en la industria de construccion de maquinaria de nuestro pais y agrego que nuestro partido presta gran atencion a esta fabrica.
					
					En el segundo destino, se cercioro de la estructura y caracteristicas tecnicas de las maquinas elaboradas.
					
					Averiguo tambien la funcion de las maquinas producidas en la fabrica.
					
					Subrayando que es muy elevada la funcion de las maquinas, evaluo los meritos de los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos y tecnicos de la fabrica que producen las modernas maquinas a nuestro estilo.
					
					Presento las tareas que se presentan ante ella.
					
					Senalo que debe producir mucho mas las maquinas modernas convenientes a la situacion del pais que surten gran efecto en la realidad y gozan de gran reputacion de los usuarios.
					
					Refirio que las unidades correspondientes deben esforzarse activamente por suministrar a tiempo los modernos accesorios de maquinas al estilo coreano.
					
					Seguidamente, recorrio el albergue de los obreros de la fabrica.
					
					En las habitaciones visitadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal dijo que estan bien acondicionadas, por lo tanto los internos gustaran vivir alli.
					
					Recorriendo el comedor y el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios, se cercioro del estado de abastecimiento de intendencia.
					
					Acto seguido, dio vuelta al jardin de la infancia de la Fabrica nuevamente construida.
					
					Tras mostrarse satisfecho de que el patio deportivo y el lugar de juego estan acomodados bien para que los ninos puedan jugar a sus anchas, estuvo en la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recorrio los cuartos escuchando atentamente la historia de benevolencia del Presidente impregnada en la guarderia infantil y presencio tambien la caligrafia de los ninos.
					
					En la sala de diversion, vio la funcion de los ninos y abrazo a los ninos para tomar la foto.
					
					Encomendo reiteradamente a las educadoras alimentar bien a los ninos y formarlos tan bien para que no tengan ninguna incomodidad.
					
					Ultimamente, el Mariscal entro en el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Kangsong.
					
					Al dar vuelta a la sala de diversion, la sala de deporte, la piscina y comedores, recibio informe de que los ciudadanos tienen envidia tambien y expreso alegria diciendo que en el mundo de los obreros, ellos disfrutan a sus anchas de vida civilizada.
					
					Al destacar que si la fabrica se pone en pleno funcionamiento, el mismo se encargara de las condiciones, resolvio los medios de transporte necesarios a la fabrica.
					
					Y se fotografio junto a los obreros de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil, Son Chol Ju y Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita fiesta nacional de Seychelles
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita fiesta nacional de Seychelles
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Seychelles, James Alix Michel, con motivo de la fiesta nacional de este pais.
					El remitente expresa la confianza de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Seychelles seguiran  desarrollandose favorablemente en el futuro y desea al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las labores para el desarrollo socio-economico del pais.

articles.title: ACR demanda al Sur de Corea cese de secuestro de norcoreanos
articles.content:
ACR demanda al Sur de Corea cese de secuestro de norcoreanos
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que la banda de los titeres surcoreanos sigue perpetrando el criminal rapto y el trafico de los habitantes norcoreanos, el vocero del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 17 como sigue:
					Como ya trascendidos, cuando se ha descubierto que la camarilla titere surcoreana trato de cometer otra barbarie antietica de raptar a los adolescentes y ninos norcoreanos y llevarlos al Sur de Corea, le volvimos a exigir fuertemente parar inmediatamente esa sucia operacion.
					
					A pesar de esto, fue destapado hace poco otro caso igual en que estan involucrados los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea y los intermediarios en la trata de personas.
					
					A instigacion de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, ellos llevaron a mas de una decena de habitantes norcoreanos a un escondrijo en el pais extranjero y cuando se torno intenso el control, trataron de sacarlos de ese pais tras guardarlos en la embajada surcoreana.
					
					El caso causa mas consternacion si se toma en cuenta que Chongwadae se encargo directamente de esa operacion.
